meta.description: Exploratory testing across core meal planning flows using Chrome DevTools MCP.

items.title: Baseline smoke check
items.description: Verify the app loads, unauthenticated nav renders, and core landing CTAs are visible.
acceptance_criteria: No blocking UI errors are visible

items.title: Seeded user sign-in
items.description: Log in with seeded basic, premium, and admin accounts and confirm role-specific redirects.
acceptance_criteria: basic@example.com signs in and reaches dashboard
premium@example.com signs in and reaches dashboard
admin@example.com signs in and can access admin routes

items.title: Preferences onboarding
items.description: Walk through preferences setup and confirm selections persist on reload.
acceptance_criteria: Preferences flow is reachable from dashboard
Selections are saved and visible after reload
Validation errors are shown for missing required fields

items.title: Generate 7-day plan
items.description: Generate a plan from preferences and verify all seven days render.
acceptance_criteria: Loading and empty states are sensible

items.title: Edit meal plan
items.description: Swap a meal, regenerate a day, and verify changes persist.

items.title: Recipe details
items.description: Open a recipe from the plan and validate ingredients, steps, and navigation.
acceptance_criteria: Recipe detail page opens from plan

items.title: Shopping list generation
items.description: Generate a list from the current plan and validate grouping and totals.

items.title: Export or copy shopping list
items.description: Use export/copy/print affordances and confirm output content.
acceptance_criteria: Exported content includes all list items
No broken links or empty exports

items.title: Plan history
items.description: Navigate plan history and ensure previous plans are accessible.
acceptance_criteria: Selecting an older plan loads correctly

items.title: Account settings
items.description: Review account/profile settings and verify updates or validations.

items.title: Upgrade/downgrade prompts
items.description: Validate premium upsell messaging and upgrade flows from free user.
acceptance_criteria: Upgrade CTA appears for free users

items.title: Admin tools access
items.description: Verify admin-only tools access and that non-admins are blocked.
acceptance_criteria: Non-admin users cannot access admin routes
